imdb.plot outline: This short documentary series follows the famous French-American artist CharlElie Couture during the recording of his new album "Lafayette" at the Dockside Studio in Southern Louisiana. In these 10-min long videos, you discover the behind the scenes, and how CharlElie discovered and worked with many local musicians including Chris Stafford from the Feufollet, the Michot brothers from The Lost Bayou Ramblers, Zachary Richard, and many more. Each episode tells a different part of the story of this new album, and were aired on French public television as well as online.
imdb.title: CharlElie Couture: Lafayette
plot: This short documentary series follows the famous French-American artist CharlElie Couture in the making of his new album "Lafayette" recorded at the Dockside Studio in Southern Louisiana.::Shaan Couture

This short documentary series follows the famous French-American artist CharlElie Couture during the recording of his new album "Lafayette" at the Dockside Studio in Southern Louisiana. In these 10-min long videos, you discover the behind the scenes, and how CharlElie discovered and worked with many local musicians including Chris Stafford from the Feufollet, the Michot brothers from The Lost Bayou Ramblers, Zachary Richard, and many more. Each episode tells a different part of the story of this new album, and were aired on French public television as well as online.::Shaan Couture
